channel.title: AD on live life to the fullest.
channel.description: Recent content in AD on live life to the fullest.

item.title: Active Directory
item.description: Identify devices on the interanet How to identify active directory domain controllers on the intranet by using DNS lookup Example for Domain Name abc.local nslookup -type=any _ldap._tcp.abc.local nslookup -type=any _kerberos._tcp.abc.local
